MUSIC_COPY.description: App headline for play music: Listen to music with Google Play Music all access

MUSIC_SUB_COPY.description: A subtitle for Play Music: supports the headline by giving the app name

MUSIC_DESCRIPTION.message: Desfrute de uma infinita coleção de música na Web com o Google Play Música.
MUSIC_DESCRIPTION.description: Describes how you can listen to unlimited music with Google Play Music (GPM)

MUSIC_SECTION_UPLOAD_TITLE.description: Feature headline: Describes the uploading feature of google play

MUSIC_SECTION_UPLOAD_DESCRIPTION.message: Traga gratuitamente até 20.000 músicas da sua biblioteca do iTunes<sup>®</sup> ou de qualquer pasta de música para o Google Play.
MUSIC_SECTION_UPLOAD_DESCRIPTION.description: Feature description: Describes the features of the upload/music manager feature.

MUSIC_SECTION_ANYWHERE_DESCRIPTION.message: O Google Play mantém sua biblioteca de música atualizada automaticamente no seu telefone, tablet e Chromebook.
MUSIC_SECTION_ANYWHERE_DESCRIPTION.description: Feature description: can be used on multiple different devices which are kept in sync.

MUSIC_SECTION_UNLIMITED_DESCRIPTION.message: Use o Acesso ilimitado ao Google Play Música para ouvir milhões de músicas, criar rádios personalizadas e "pular" as músicas que quiser.
MUSIC_SECTION_UNLIMITED_DESCRIPTION.description: Feature description: Describes what you can do with Play Music All Access

MUSIC_HINT_TITLE.message: E se eu usar o iTunes<sup>®</sup>?
MUSIC_HINT_TITLE.description: Question headline: Addresses concenrs for iTunes users

MUSIC_HINT_DESCRIPTION.message: O Google Play Música é uma alternativa baseada na nuvem ao iTunes<sup>®</sup>. Faça upload de até 20.000 músicas usando gratuitamente o Gerenciador de Música do Google.
MUSIC_HINT_DESCRIPTION.description: Question description: Describes google play music as an alternate to iTunes and says you can upload songs to it via music manager

MUSIC_MEESAGE_BAR.description: Listen now section of Google Play Music

MUSIC_BALLOON_UPLOAD.message: Faça upload de até 20.000 músicas gratuitamente com o Gerenciador de Música
MUSIC_BALLOON_UPLOAD.description: Upload tooltip: Short description of music manager

MUSIC_BALLOON_LIBRARY.message: Ouça todas as músicas que você comprou e enviou
MUSIC_BALLOON_LIBRARY.description: My Library tooltip: Description of the library section of Google Play Music

MUSIC_BALLOON_MIXES.message: Descubra instant mixes com base nas músicas que você adora
MUSIC_BALLOON_MIXES.description: Instant mixes tooltip: Describes google radio and recommend features

MUSIC_BALLOON_SHOP.message: Descubra novas músicas e compre-as diretamente na Play Store
MUSIC_BALLOON_SHOP.description: Shop tooltip: describes buying music from the play store

MUSIC_BALLOON_PLAYLISTS.description: Playlist tooltip: Describes creating and sharing playlists
